paper_abstract: The Journal of Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (JBCB) started publishing scientific articles in 2003. It has established itself as home for solid research articles in the field (similar to 60 per year) that are surprisingly well cited. JBCB has an important function as alternative publishing channel in addition to other, bigger journals.
paper_title: 10 years for the Journal of Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (2003-2013) - A retrospective
